titleStmt.title: The creation of the Prince· A sermon preached in the Colledge of VVestminster, on Trinity Sunday, the day before the creation of the most illustrious Prince of Wales. By Daniell Price, chapleine in ordinary, and then in attendance on the Prince.
titleStmt.author: Price, Daniel, 1581-1631.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. Eld, for Roger Iackson, dwelling neere Fleete Conduict,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
